DataElement.preferredName: Follow-Up Outcome Expectations Questionnaire Difficulty to Recover After Treatment Score 4 Point Likert Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Persons' stated observation of their difficulty recovering after treatment using a 4-point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Follow-Up Outcome Expectations Questionnaire Difficulty to Recover After Treatment Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A set of questions and responses designed to evaluate an individual's self-reported expectations with the outcome of treatment._A question about how difficult it was for an individual to recover after treatment._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Expected Difficulty Score 4 Point Likert Scale
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A four point ordered reference set for the subjective scoring of a person's expected difficulty level that ranges from 1: It was easier than I expected to 4: I didn't know what to expect.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: I didn't know what to expect.

ValueMeaning.preferredName: I didn't know what to expect.
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective response indicating that an individual didn't know what to expect.

Concepts.longName: Did Not Know What to Expect
Concepts.definition: A subjective response indicating that an individual does or didn't know what to expect.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: It was more difficult than I expected.

ValueMeaning.preferredName: It was more difficult than I expected.
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective response indicating that something was more difficult than expected.

Concepts.definition: A subjective response indicating that something was more difficult than expected.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: It was about what I expected.

ValueMeaning.preferredName: It was about what I expected.
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective response indicating that something was as expected.

Concepts.definition: A subjective response indicating that something was as expected.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: It was easier than I expected.

ValueMeaning.preferredName: It was easier than I expected.
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective response indicating that something was easier than expected.

Concepts.definition: A subjective response indicating that something was easier than expected.

Concepts.definition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.
